    • addStudentToDB

      public void addStudentToDB​(String firstName, String lastName, String idCard, String email, String phone) throws SQLException
      Add student to db. Method for adding student to the database.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the id card Receives the firstName student from the method insert student Tab 1
      lastName - the id card Receives the lastName student from the method insert student Tab 1
      idCard - the id card Receives the idCard student from the method insert student Tab 1
      email - the id card Receives the email student from the method insert student Tab 1
      phone - the id card Receives the phone student from the method insert student Tab 1
      Throws:
      SQLException - the sql exception

    • ifStudentExists

      public boolean ifStudentExists​(String idCard)
      If student exists boolean. Method to check if the student to be inserted exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      idCard - the id card Received from actionPerformed from Tab 1 Student button event.
      Returns:
      the boolean Checks using a boolean if exists or not exists, the student in the database.

    • getNameStudent

      public String getNameStudent​(String codeStudent)
      Get name student String. Method that returns the full name of the student using the student's code.
      Parameters:
      codeStudent - the student code Receives the selected student code from the Tab 3 Reports button event method.
      Returns:
      the array list Returns the full name of the student in a String variable.

    • getStudentList

      public ArrayList<String> getStudentList()
      Get student list array list. Method for obtaining the list of student codes.
      Returns:
      the array list Returns the codes of all students in a list.

    • getCourseList

      public ArrayList<String> getCourseList()
      Get course list array list. Method to obtain the code-name list of courses.
      Returns:
      the array list Returns the list of courses with code and name.

    • getCheckScoresToStudent

      public ArrayList<String> getCheckScoresToStudent()
      Get check scores to student array list. Method for obtaining subject scores for students courses (tab 3).
      Returns:
      the array list Returns in strings the score information of the student's course subjects.
